de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.classification

Class ConfusionMatrixEvaluationResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.classification.ConfusionMatrixEvaluationResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Result, TextWriteable

    public class ConfusionMatrixEvaluationResult
extends Object
implements Result, TextWriteable
    Provides the prediction performance measures for a classifier based on the confusion matrix. Note: this API is non-final, and will be refactored soon.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Arthur Zimek
